I've noticed that JUnit includes an (outdated) version of Hamcrest. Will fu=
ture JUnit version continue to ship with Hamcrest? Do you have plans to upd=
ate to Hamcrest 1.2 or higher? Why is there no junit-dep anymore, i.e. how =
are we supposed to use JUnit with Hamcrest 1.2?

Cheers,
Peter
